reviews.text:
Five miniature theatres, five different one-act plays, an audience of only up to fifteen, sitting closer than at any other venue you've ever been to!
Even though I speak minimal Spanish and even less Catalan, I found this to be totally immersive and because I was so close to the action, the body language brought the meaning to me. Wonderful experience. I'll definitely go again.

Even though I don't speak Catalan and my Spanish is very basic, I love coming to Microteatre to see a couple of short plays and have a few glasses of wine (or a delicious mojito!).

The food is also really great - simple but delicious sandwich combos - one perfect salad - and yummy Nutella crepes.

The talent is always top notch, and there's every possibility of seeing a TV star acting there or a YouTube celebrity. And with ten new shows to choose from each month (5 in the afternoon, 5 in the evening), you should definitely keep coming back over and over again. :)
